plot: The Story of Edith Cavell, who was shot early in WW1 for sheltering British soldiers while working as a nurse in Brussells.
title: Nurse and Martyr
plot_es: The Story of Edith Cavell, who was shot early in WW1 for sheltering British soldiers while working as a nurse in Brussells.
plot_en: The Story of Edith Cavell, who was shot early in WW1 for sheltering British soldiers while working as a nurse in Brussells.
